scc.releaseInfo:
- For All Platforms - -- Update SCAP content based on DISA's Q4 2025 releaseals -- Added NIWC developed SCAP Benchmarks for Cisco IOS XE Switch, Cisco IOS Router, Cisco IOS Switch
- For macOS -- Added support for macOS 26 -- Added NIST/NIWC collaboration DISA STIG SCAP content for macOS 26
- For Linux - -- Improve efficiency of OVAL UNIX file test4
- For Windows - -- Improve efficiency of looking up Windows group/user/sid information on large domain controllers -- Update SCC service on Windows to be 64 bit
